hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de tourisme Bretagne Côte de Granit Rose

de:
Spielerische Erkundungen und Naturparcours
Entdecken Sie unsere Holzspiele, tanken Sie neue Energie auf unseren Sinnesparcours, sammeln Sie Ideen in unserem Gemüsegarten und spielen Sie mit erneuerbaren Energien. Nehmen Sie jeden Tag an unseren Animationen teil: Stellen Sie ein Objekt aus Holz oder Ton her, stellen Sie Ihre Pizza zusammen oder folgen Sie dem Gärtner
Lust auf ein Abenteuer? Testen Sie unser Escape Game inmitten der Natur!
en:
Ecocentre Tregor - Spered All
An atypical and ethical leisure and discovery park, in Pleumeur-Bodou, near the pink granite coast and the Râdome park.
Come and play, relax, awaken your senses and your curiosity!
In a preserved natural setting, discover educational spaces combining games, relaxation and poetry
Four thematic areas:
> The Harmony Garden: an educational and unusual garden inspired by permaculture.
> The Energy Path: incredible machines to understand our energy consumption, renewable energies and the energy transition.
> The Nature Trail: a walk in the woods, where imagination and poetry take you on a game of hide and seek with the spirits of nature.
> The Sensory Trail: a barefoot trail to play with your senses
We offer a varied programme of workshops and activities for individuals and groups.
But also, many wooden games, a shop of local craftsmen (ceramics, leather, beer, seeds, plans, vegetables...)
In July/August, eat on the terrace of our organic and vegetarian restaurant. During a gourmet break, discover a cuisine with the colours and flavours of the garden.
The Ecocentre also offers various courses and workshops! A gateway to the reappropriation of know-how in various fields: ecological gardening, eco-construction, cooking and well-being.
it:
Esplorazioni ludiche e percorsi naturalistici
Venite a scoprire i nostri giochi in legno, a fare il pieno di energia nei nostri percorsi sensoriali, a raccogliere idee nel nostro orto e a giocare con le energie rinnovabili. Ogni giorno, partecipate alle nostre attività: costruite un oggetto in legno o argilla, preparate la vostra pizza o seguite il giardiniere
Cercate l'avventura? Provate il nostro Escape Game in mezzo alla natura!
fr:
Explorations ludiques et parcours nature
Venez découvrir nos jeux en bois, vous ressourcer sur nos parcours sensoriels, butiner des idées dans notre potager et jouer avec les énergies renouvelables. Chaque jour participez à nos animations : fabriquez un objet en bois, en argile, composez votre pizza ou suivez le jardinier. 
Envie d'aventure ? Testez notre Escape Game en pleine nature !
nl:
Speelse verkenningen en natuurpaden
Kom onze houten spelletjes ontdekken, doe nieuwe energie op onze zintuiglijke paden, doe ideeën op in onze moestuin en speel met hernieuwbare energie. Neem elke dag deel aan onze activiteiten: maak een voorwerp van hout of klei, maak je eigen pizza of volg de tuinman
Op zoek naar avontuur? Probeer onze Escape Game midden in de natuur!
es:
Exploraciones lúdicas y recorridos por la naturaleza
Venga a descubrir nuestros juegos de madera, recargue las pilas en nuestros senderos sensoriales, recoja ideas en nuestro huerto y juegue con energías renovables. Participa todos los días en nuestras actividades: fabrica un objeto de madera o arcilla, haz tu propia pizza o sigue al jardinero
¿Busca aventuras? ¡Pruebe nuestro Juego de Escape en plena naturaleza!
